about.title: About Me
about.description: I primarily work as a product implementation consultant in the SCM industry, while pursuing my passion for AI and technology as an AI enthusiast. Building on my university research in image recognition, I now develop solutions utilizing text, image, and video generation AI, along with prediction models and web applications. As a Japanese-English bilingual, I bring a global perspective to every project.
expertiseItems: Generative AI (Text, Image & Video Generation, Chatbot Development)

positions.title: SCM Company Employee (Main Job)
positions.description: Responsible for SCM product implementation support and business improvement consulting.
highlights: SCM system implementation for major manufacturers

positions.title: Freelance (Personal Work)
positions.description: Involved in various projects including generative AI, machine learning model development, and web application development.
highlights: Development of AI chatbots using large language models

positions.title: Education
positions.description: Learned a wide range of topics from basic mathematics to practical applications. Engaged in research on image recognition and classification.
highlights: Implementation and evaluation of machine learning models

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: My expertise and skill set in machine learning, AI, and web development

works.title: Works
works.description: Major projects in machine learning, AI, and web application development

projects.title: Machine Learning Prediction Model
projects.description: Development of prediction models using tabular and image data. Participated in Kaggle competitions with top rankings.

projects.title: Generative AI Chatbot
projects.description: Development of custom chatbots utilizing the latest generative AI models. Achieved dialogue control through prompt engineering. (Sorry, this is a Japanese model.)
